original_title: Der lachende Mann - Bekenntnisse eines Mörders
overview: Posing as West German journalists, East German documentary filmmakers Heynowski and Scheumann pay a visit to the notorious Nazi-turned-mercenary Siegfried “Kongo” Müller, pump him with booze, and get him to talk about his life and war campaigns in Africa.

production_companies.name: VEB DEFA Studio für Wochenschau und Dokumentarfilme

title: The Laughing Man
